scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run removeBuild 2> /dev/null && npm run startDev
scripts.dev-http: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run removeBuild 2> /dev/null && webpack-dev-server --config internals/webpack.dev.http.js --progress --colors --port 80 --hot --inline --no-info --display-error-details
scripts.build: cd ../App && npm run clipper && cd ../Clipper && npm run build-chrome
scripts.build-chrome: export NODE_ENV=production | rm -r build/chrome 2> /dev/null | webpack --config internals/webpack.build.chrome.js
scripts.build-firefox: npm run source && export NODE_ENV=production | rm -r build/firefox 2> /dev/null | webpack --config internals/webpack.build.firefox.js
scripts.build-opera: export NODE_ENV=production | rm -r build/opera 2> /dev/null | webpack --config internals/webpack.build.opera.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build-chrome && npm run build-firefox && npm run build-opera
scripts.source: zip -FSr -q -X source.zip internals pages src .babelrc package.json yarn.lock README.md
scripts.git: git add . && git commit -a -m "6.0" && git push --set-upstream origin master
